title: Fast Learner Luke Lamperti Keeping It ‘Simple’ on Way to the Top
content:
Promising US sprinter Lamperti talks ‘consistent’ rookie year, discovering who he is as a rider and targeting future Milan-Sanremo glory.

Read the full article at Fast Learner Luke Lamperti Keeping It ‘Simple’ on Way to the Top on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
